Name: oid
Description: row identifier (hidden attribute; must be explicitly selected)

Name: oprnamespace
Description: the oid of the namespace that contains this operator

Name: oprkind
Description: b = infix ("both"), l = prefix ("left"), r = postfix ("right")

Name: oprcom
Description: commutator of this operator, if any

Name: oprnegate
Description: negator of this operator, if any

Name: oprrest
Description: restriction selectivity estimation function for this operator

Name: oprjoin
Description: join selectivity estimation function for this operator
